title: Snakemake Config
description: A configuration file for a Snakemake pipeline

reference-genomes.description: The unique identifier for a product

version.description: A version identifier for the reference genome used E.g. GRCh38

file.description: The name of the Reference Genomes FASTA file, located in the resources folder

samples.description: A list of samples to be processed in this run

name.description: The name of the sample, and its input .vcf.gz file

reference_version.description: The identifier of the reference genome version used to call this data

exclusions.description: A list of vcf IDs as given in the input files to be excluded from this analysis

locations.description: The unique identifier for a product

items.description: An object representing a genomic location

name.description: The name of the region (Ideally gene name where applicable) that will be studied

transcripts.description: A ordered (in terms of priority) list of transcript IDs with which to retrive variant effect prediction results from

chromosome.description: The chromosome that this region is located on, using numerical nomenclature

strand.description: A string indicating the forward or reverse strand using numerical nomenclature

start.description: The start base pair coordinates for the region of interest

stop.description: The stop base pair coordinates for the region of interest

cluster.description: The unique identifier for a product

clusters.description: A list of the available clusters you would like to investigate. Please note, you will need to provide sample-level classifications for each level specified

file.description: The name of an Excel file stored in the resources folder with an ID and n*clusters column indicating cluster classification per individual

environment.description: An environment declaration containing resource definitions and runtime settings

email.description: An object containing email runtime settings for job notification

address.description: An email address to be contacted upon certain conditions (as defined in conditions field)

conditions.description: A list of applicable conditions to email the user on

working-directory.description: A full file path to the current/desired working directory where the pipeline will look for this configuration

queues.description: A list of available queues that can be scheduled to, as well as their resource limitations

name.description: The name of the queue, used to reference it during runtime

walltime.description: The maximum allowable walltime for a job on this queue

memory.description: The maximum allocatable memory for a job on this queue
